author: A.J. Rice
title: How China is Using the COVID Crisis to Turn American Oil Red
description: Chinese firms buying up our producers could be a deadly side effect of the current health crisis. The post How China is Using the COVID Crisis to Turn American Oil Red appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
Chinese firms buying up our producers could be a deadly side effect of the current health crisis.If Texas was its own country, it would be the worlds third largest oil producer. Only Russia and Saudi Arabia produce more oil per day than the Lone Star State.
